title: All Hallows Hell
description:
The universe has a mind of its own, and we're all subject to it's wrath at certain times. Like when mercury is in retrograde, or when there's a full moon, or on All Hallows Eve, the night of Halloween. The universe expands to welcome the paranormal, and make good people do crazy things. There's no anticipating the chaos and hauntings that can happen to you on halloween. 

First, curiosity killed the cat
Followed by a towns murderous curse
Then, more death in Salem
And in a special bonus story, No Tricks, Only Treats 
Finally in our featured story, legend that strikes you dead 

Kick off the spooky season with a new Something Scary t-shirt! Go to SomethingScary.com for an early Halloween treat and get a 20% discount applied at checkout all month long.
Do you want to connect with other people who love horror and all things Something Scary? Join our new Discord. Join our Patreon and get members only access to our Discord. Go to Patreon.com/snarled

Thanks to our sponsors!
• Learn more and save 10% off your first month at BetterHelp.com/SCARY.
• Follow The Generation Why Podcast on Amazon Music or listen early and ad-free by joining Wondery Plus on Apple Podcasts, or the Wondery app.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
